name: df-efg
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5
body: |- wceq(cefg, cmpt(s0, universe, cint(cab(s1, wa(wer(cv(s1), cword(cxp(cv(s0), c2o))), wral(s2, cword(cxp(cv(s0), c2o)), wral(s3, co(nat0, cfz, cfv(chash, cv(s2))), wral(s4, cv(s0), wral(s5, c2o, wbr(cv(s2), cv(s1), co(cv(s2), csplice, cotp(cv(s3), cv(s3), cs2(cop(cv(s4), cv(s5)), cop(cv(s4), cdif(c1o, cv(s5))))))))))))))))
comment: Define the free group equivalence relation, which is the smallest equivalence relation ` ~~ ` such that for any words ` A , B ` and formal symbol ` x ` with inverse ` invg x ` , ` A B ~~ A x ( invg x ) B ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Oct-2015.)
